page.title: 18Food in the 1980's
page.content: With the increase in working mothers the '80's has seen an enormous increase in the use of{convenience {foods}that are ready to serve after heating. Within the last 5 years {microwave ovens}have been introduced and they increase the speed of cooking. Nearly every home has a {fridge}and{freezer}and there are many shops selling only freezer food. Ready-made foods contain many {additives}and{flavourings.}Some of these cause concern among nutritionists. Some have already been found to have side effects. Because of this there has been a marked increase in{wholefood}shops where{organically {grown}food can be bought. Many people are becoming{vegetarian}through choice and economy as meat is an expensive item. Foods such as yoghurt, muesli and oven chips have become popular.
